data.title: Wish Me Good Luck, Kiss Me Good-bye
data.meta_description: A popular song from 1934.Words and music by Benny Davis and Milton Ager. Sheet music provided by Laurence Rubenstein: Wish-Me-Good-Luck-Kiss-Me-Goodbye – SHEET MUSICDownload Accompaniment by …
data.text:
A popular song from 1934.

Words and music by Benny Davis and Milton Ager.

Sheet music provided by Laurence Rubenstein:

Accompaniment by James Pitt-Payne:

Lyrics

Tho’ parting fills my heart with sorrow

My darling, you can lessen the pain

Until that beautiful tomorrow

When I can hold you in my arms again

Chorus

Wish me good luck, kiss me goodbye

Give me a smile to cheer me on my way

Give me a rose to keep love burning

Just for remembrance until my returning

Leave me a song to take along

To sing within my heart both night and day

Leave me the mem’ry of Love’s tender sigh

Wish me good luck, kiss me good-bye

Leave me your love for inspiration

The thought of you will carry me far

One more embrace for consolation

Let me remember you the way you are

Sung here by Fred Feild:
